scripts.vendor:refresh: rm -rf vendor && mkdir -p vendor/katex/contrib vendor/katex/fonts vendor/html2pdf && cp node_modules/katex/dist/katex.min.js vendor/katex/ && cp node_modules/katex/dist/contrib/auto-render.min.js vendor/katex/contrib/ && cp node_modules/katex/dist/katex.min.css vendor/katex/ && cp node_modules/katex/dist/fonts/* vendor/katex/fonts/ && cp node_modules/html2pdf.js/dist/html2pdf.bundle.min.js vendor/html2pdf/
